## 私について

- 氏名: 瓜生真也 (Shinya Uryu)
- 所属: 国立環境研究所 (National Institute for Environmental Studies)

Hi! I'm Shinya Uryu, a engineer working with [National Institute for Environmental Studies (NIES)](https://www.nies.go.jp), and member of HOXO-M that Japanese young data scientist group. Passionate about data science, management and statistics. My favorite open-source language is [R](https://www.r-project.org/). I'm a [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/) fanboy. I got my MS in Plant Ecology, Yokohama National University. I love to plants, especially oak (*Quercus*) trees. I currently live in Tsukuba, Japan.
